item.title: K8s Helm Charts
item.description: Package manager for all the manifests that need to be deployed to a cluster Components chart.yaml - metadata about the chart values.yaml - values for variables exposed by the chart author templates dir - yaml manifest that define the rsources/objects to be deployed, variables are replaces with values as specified in values.yaml Search charts called database in default repository helm seach hub database Add a custom repository helm add repo myrep https://myrepo.
